name: WooCommerce – Exportex
author: Smart Soft

sections.description:
The best data export WordPress plugin for Woocommerce. Full-featured tool which export products, orders, categories, customers in CSV, XSLT, ODS (*) format.
You can use it for integrate with marketplaces, CRM system or migrate your date.

Module is easy to use and does not require technical knowledge. Module support CSV, XSLT, XLSX, ODS file formats and scheduled import and export cron jobs.
Export export to server (local file), FTP/SFTP or sent to your email (*).

(*) Some features requires pro version.

FEATURES

  • Easy entity field’s selection.
  • CSV, XSLT, XLSX, ODS file formats support. (*)
  • Export with or without field label.
  • Custom label name.
  • Static fields. (*)
  • Custom meta fields export. (*)
  • Export to server, FTP/SFTP or emial. (*)
  • Change export filename.
  • Strip tags option (remove all html tags from description etc) (*)
  • Export only new added items. (*)
  • Delimiter and separator option.
  • Filter create date option. (*)
  • Filter by categories/status/type/tags for products (*)
  • Filter by customers groups/ payments/ status for orders. (*)
  • Filter by customers groups customers. (*)
  • Automatic scheduled export using cron job. (*)

(*) Some features requires pro version.

Preview

(*) Some features requires pro version.

Usage

For help, please refer to our user guide

(*) Some features requires pro version.

Support

Support forum
sections.installation: Please, visit the link and follow the instructions
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Added: First working release of the Plugin
